name: Flora (itch) (Alex Duncan)
description:
In Flora, you guide the growth of a tree. Grow your trunk, add branches and roots, but be sure to manage your resources carefully! Seasonal changes can drastically alter the tree's situation, and if you're unprepared the tree won't survive very long.

Flora is an ongoing project for me. This is the first version I am releasing, and it might be a bit rough around the edges. I am open to feedback and criticism, as I will be expanding the game a fair bit in the coming months.

Left mouse to create a new object, right mouse to destroy it, CLICK middle mouse or press space to rotate it.
